course_title: Video Game Writing - VDEO GM WRT

001.comments: All CRWR Winter Term 1 (September-December) courses/sections will be held online. This particular course will be a synchronous, with optional periodic Zoom sessions where students can engage directly with the instructor. These sessions will be recorded, and students who cannot participate will have an opportunity to send in questions in advance.

description: A workshop class on writing for video games. Restricted to Creative Writing majors.
